t: Amazon.com: WE ARE[LP]: CDs & Vinyl
s: - vinyl edge was not smooth but rough and jagged. - album cover title is misrepresented. The title is on a sticker on the plastic wrap, not on the cover next to Jon. - I don't recommend buying it in this record format. I may wait for a better 180 gram record or just buy the mp3. - I returned it today to a UPS store and my refund was made in eight minutes after returning the record ... If you know Jon Batiste ...

s: Recorded in a church in New Orleans, and produced by T-Bone Burnett, Jon Batiste's major label debut is a stunning showcase of the brilliant pianist and vocalist. Primarily just Jon and his piano, Hollywood Africans includes standards, unexpected covers, and original songs.
